name: Médico
description:
Médico is a 2D top-down minimalist adventure game where you are a doctor sent on a secret mission to the distant rebelling colony of a rival empire. Using only your medical skills and conversation, you must find clues across the colony to track down a fellow missing doctor, whose potential involvement with the rebels could start a war on the home continent. Who you choose to heal can give you clues and direction, but time is precious and you can't save everyone.

This prototype is a proof of concept, showing a single location with characters to talk to, a few dynamic events, and an opportunity to try out the healing system. There is planned work to expand this game into a complete experience, any feedback is welcome.

Created by Jack Rathbone
